data.text: Blessed is the man who doesn’t walk in the counsel of the wicked,
but his delight is in the LORD’s1:2 When rendered in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS, “LORD” or “GOD” is the translation of God’s Proper Name. law.
He will be like a tree planted by the streams of water,
Therefore the wicked shall not stand in the judgement,
For the LORD knows the way of the righteous,
